Title: Ladies Rotary rose gold tone crystal dial watch LB00244/41
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Ladies Rotary rose gold tone crystal dial watch LB00244/41 RRP £199.00 Now £89.00 Description This fashionable Rotary ladies bracelet watch features a rose gold plated design with luxurious crystal and mother of pearl detailing. The round dial measures 30mm wide including the crown with slim 6mm deep casing making in an ideal choice for a petite wrist. The mother of pearl face has rose tone batons marking the hours and is framed by a glittering crystal set bezel with white crystals set in a rose tone setting. The brick link style rose gold plated brick link bracelet measures 14mm wide and secures with a push button folding clasp. The bracelet measures approximately 6.5” in length with links available to be professionally removed ensuring the perfect fit. This quartz battery operated Rotary watch comes with a lifetime Rotary watch warranty covering internal working parts for peace of mind. The watch requires servicing by the Rotary service team every three years to keep it at optimum condition and maintain the lifetime warranty. Chapelle reference: 08131123 Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP. We purchase at the best possible prices and pass on these savings to our customers. All our items are new and perfect goods; we do not sell seconds or second-hand items. Orders being sent to international destinations will be sent by Royal Mail International Signed For delivery. Visit our ebay store for our full range >>
